text.div:
Patient Identifier Type Codes

A coded type for a Patient identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose (identification of a patient).

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203 http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203
    Code Display
    PPN Passport Number
    PI Patient Identifier
    PN Person Number
    RRI Regional Registry ID
  • Include these codes as defined in IHE-PAM-Fr http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0203
    Code Display
    NNFRA National Person Identifier where the FRA is the ISO table 3166 3-character (alphabetic) country code
    INS-NIA" NIR d'attente (temporaire)
    INS-NIR" NIR définitif
    INS-C" Calculated National Identifier
    NDP Identifiant du patient au Dossier Pharmaceutique
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0203

extension.valueMarkdown: Types are for general categories of identifiers. See [the identifier registry](identifier-registry.h     tml) for a list of common identifier systems
